channel.title: IAM - Administration on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in IAM - Administration on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Get Access Key and Secret Access Key
item.description: To get your AWS Access Key ID and AWS Secret Access Key, you can follow these steps: Sign in to the AWS Management Console: Open your web browser and go to the AWS Management Console at https://console.aws.amazon.com/. Sign in using your AWS account credentials. Open the IAM service: Once you are logged in to the AWS Management Console, search for “IAM” (Identity and Access Management) in the services search bar, and click on the IAM service to open it.
